articles.title: SBI hikes interest rates on fixed deposits: Check new rates here | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The country's largest lender, State Bank of India (SBI) has hiked interest rates on fixed deposits of less than  ₹2 Cr.
articles.content: The country's largest lender, State Bank of India (SBI) has hiked interest rates on fixed deposits of less than 2 Cr. The bank's website states that the revised rates are effective as of 13.08.2022. … [+3153 chars]

articles.title: Jio launches Rs 750 prepaid plan with 2GB data per day and more - 91mobiles
articles.description: A new Jio prepaid plan has been launched in India ahead of Independence day. Here are the details on the Independence Day Jio daily prepaid plan's price and benefits.
articles.content: The new Rs 750 Jio plan comes on the occasion of India’s 75th Independence day. It offers 2GB of data per day along with unlimited calls to any network and 100 SMS each day. The new pack sits slightl… [+981 chars]
